content: रथः [रम्यतेऽनेन अत्र वा, रम्-क्थन्; <ab>cf.</ab> <ls>Uṇ. 2. 2</ls>] {@--1@} A carriage, chariot, car, vehicle; especially, a warchariot. {@--2@} A hero (for रथिन्). {@--3@} A foot. {@--4@} A limb, part, member. {@--5@} The body; <ab>cf.</ab> आत्मानं रथिनं बिद्धि शरीरं रथमेव तु .. <ls>Kaṭh.</ls> {@--6@} A reed. {@--7@} Pleasure, delight.
